active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a cloud-centric era, debate the ongoing relevance of physical media labeling. Analyze real-world breaches (e.g., lost labeled USBs causing data leaks like the 2010 Wikileaks incident) versus cloud alternatives, categorizing risks (physical loss vs. misconfiguration) and proposing hybrid solutions. Address misconceptions like 'physical media is obsolete.'
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.
